on reading compounds: 陸海【リクカイ】land and sea
北陸【ホクリク】Hokuriku region of Honshu (incl. Niigata, Toyama, Ishikawa and Fukui prefectures)
碌【ロク】satisfactory, decent, good, proper, worthy
碌碌【ロクロク】hardly, barely, inadequately (with negative grammatical constructions)
双六【スゴロク】sugoroku, traditional Japanese board game played with dice
kun reading compounds: 丘【おか】hill, height, knoll, rising ground, bonus points awarded to the winner at the end of a game
